description: An entity produced from something else. Eg: reactions -> is_produced_by -> gene_reaction_complexes. This is in contrast to `was_created_from` or `was_created_using`, because this represents the relationship '_from is generally produced by _to' (and may be produced by other things), instead of '_from was specifically created from the data in _to'

_from.description: The ID of a vertex that produces something else.

_to.description: The ID of a vertex that is produced by something else.
